ai.summary: Magho Cliff Walk is a short, easy 1.3 km trail along coastal cliffs in the UK. The route is suitable for families and beginners, with gentle gradients and well-marked paths offering scenic sea views and surrounding countryside.
ai.terrain_summary: Gravel and dirt paths with grassy sections and a few rocky steps near the cliff edge. Sections can be uneven and exposed in places, with limited shade. Wear sturdy footwear and be prepared for windy conditions near the cliff tops.
ai.safety_notes: Stay on marked paths and keep a safe distance from the edge, as weather can change quickly and cliff edges may be unstable. Wear sturdy footwear, carry water, and check local conditions before you go. Keep dogs on a short leash where required. In poor visibility or high winds, postpone the walk.
recommended_gear: Sturdy walking shoes with good grip
Layered clothing and a windproof/waterproof jacket
Sun protection (hat, sunscreen) in sunny weather
Map or offline navigation; fully charged phone
Small first-aid kit and blister care items
ai.best_seasons: Late spring to early autumn usually offers the best conditions and views; the route can be done year-round with proper gear for rain, wind, and cold.

seo.title: Magho Cliff Walk: Easy 1.3 km Cliffside Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Explore Magho Cliff Walk, an easy 1.3 km coastal trail in the UK. Learn about the terrain, safety tips, best seasons, and gear to bring.
